channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Guardium

item.title: CVE-2012-3337|2024-09-17T01:26:46.111Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20guardium
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Guardium 8.0, 8.01, and 8.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to download arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 78284.
